variable.name: autoload
variable.description: List of module or script which are automatically loaded on startup.

variable.name: owner
variable.description: The owner of the bot gets special privileges and protection. You can specify multiple owners using a comma separated list, e.g. "owner1, owner2, owner3".

variable.name: admin
variable.description: This setting defines which contact person should be shown in .status, /msg help, and other places. You really should include this information.
